rows.label: tlk70000013_03_msg0001
rows.name:
Did Popolo muck something up again?
Seems like she got another good
scolding from the chairman.

rows.label: tlk70000013_03_msg0002
rows.name:
She's probably due for one of her
nervous breakdowns. I've got to have
boatloads of fluffy potatoes ready.

rows.label: tlk70000013_03_msg0003
rows.name:
Ah, no, I exaggerated a little bit there.
She's fine really! It's just an old, old
habit of hers...

rows.label: tlk70000013_03_msg0004
rows.name:
Popolo pilfers the chairman's snacks
when she gets angry about something.

rows.label: tlk70000013_03_msg0005
rows.name:
But then the fear and shame set in,
and she always shows up here to
replace however much she stole.
